title: Question:
author: Jawhead999
content: This trilogy Juan Francisco Estrada Romero vs Román Alberto González Luna was planned on March 5, 2022 before, but it's got cancelled due to Covid-19 and Julio Cesar Martinez replacing Estrada position. Now the trilogy of Estrada vs Chocolatito has been planned on December 3, 2022 and it seems high likely would be happen considering Covid-19 case are keep dropping and the rules are not stricter than before.The first fight Estrada vs Chocolatito, Chocolatito won via Unanimous Decision. The second fight were controversial since many people saw Chocolatito clearly won, but two judges score favor on Estrada, especially there's one judge score 117-111 while their fight are really close.This trilogy will prove which one is the best here, looking from the odds Chocolatito is the favorite with 1.50x odds while Estrada is the underdog with 2.48x odds.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: The second fight was controversial it's about time that both fighters go all out and go for the knockout, and not give it to the judges, both fighters love to engage which is the reason why judges are having a hard time with the two fights both fighters have good highlights I hope this time they settle it and go all out and go for knock out, Chocolatito is not getting any younger for him to afford a fourth fight.I expect another slugfest and hopefully, the organization will get the right judges for this fight as this fight will be hard to score.,

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: And since they have won their previous fight this year if I'm not mistaken, this fight has to take place but I was surprised that they have pushed it before the end of the year.And so we are again treated with another great fight between this two legends so for sure another 12 rounds of action pack between the two.Just another side note though that Nonito "The Filipino Flash" Donare wants to go down to this weight class. And he is targeting Chocolatito already, but let's see first this great fight and maybe Donaire wil l be just waiting at the side.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: I voted for Chocolatito, even though he is the older and they say that he is already past his prime, but if you put a fighter like Estrada in front of him (his rival), for sure it will bring the best out of him again.Yes, I do agree that the fight is controversial, specially the 1st one, and so obviously they needed a 3rd fight to settle down the score. Chocolatito is the harder puncher for me and as the rounds go further, we will see him out punch Estrada in terms of volume, so this will end on the card and Chocolatito with majority or split decision win.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: It looks like another rivalry has to end this year.  It is quite interesting how Chocolatito will adjust after the controversial decision that makes him lose his WBA (Super) super flyweight title.  I think his camp is planning to let the judge handles the decision and would go for the knockout if possible.Quote from: Jawhead999 on October 03, 2022, 02:19:37 PMThe second fight were controversial since many people saw Chocolatito clearly won, but two judges score favor on Estrada, especially there's one judge score 117-111 while their fight are really close.There is a possibility that the decision is to set up a trilogy since I believe the 2nd match is quite close (possibly can go either way) and decided to give the fight to Estrada and somehow make it a bit controversial to open a path for a trilogy.  With a controversial decision, it will be easy marketing for the boxing promoters.

comments.author: CaVO32
comments.body: Quote from: Yaunfitda on October 03, 2022, 08:04:43 PMI voted for Chocolatito, even though he is the older and they say that he is already past his prime, but if you put a fighter like Estrada in front of him (his rival), for sure it will bring the best out of him again.Yes, I do agree that the fight is controversial, specially the 1st one, and so obviously they needed a 3rd fight to settle down the score. Chocolatito is the harder puncher for me and as the rounds go further, we will see him out punch Estrada in terms of volume, so this will end on the card and Chocolatito with majority or split decision win.Chocolatito will show what he's got here. Happy that they got this trilogy sched this year. For now, forum voters are rooting for Chocolatito. Let us see if this will be the same with sportsbooks. But right now, it is not yet listed. Seems that we have a good lineup of boxing matches before the year ends as I am also waiting for Inoue vs Butler match.

comments.author: TravelMug
comments.body: Quote from: CaVO32 on October 04, 2022, 12:01:15 AMQuote from: Yaunfitda on October 03, 2022, 08:04:43 PMI voted for Chocolatito, even though he is the older and they say that he is already past his prime, but if you put a fighter like Estrada in front of him (his rival), for sure it will bring the best out of him again.Yes, I do agree that the fight is controversial, specially the 1st one, and so obviously they needed a 3rd fight to settle down the score. Chocolatito is the harder puncher for me and as the rounds go further, we will see him out punch Estrada in terms of volume, so this will end on the card and Chocolatito with majority or split decision win.Chocolatito will show what he's got here. Happy that they got this trilogy sched this year. For now, forum voters are rooting for Chocolatito. Let us see if this will be the same with sportsbooks. But right now, it is not yet listed. Seems that we have a good lineup of boxing matches before the year ends as I am also waiting for Inoue vs Butler match.I also rooting for Chocolatito, I guess he will be the crowd favorite because of so many great fights that he gave us including the first two.Commend as well for Estrada to honor his word that he wanted a trilogy, and so it is already set. Others say that Roman is also past his prime because of his age, I disagree though, for me Estrada is the more damage one even if he is the younger between them.

comments.author: bisdak40
comments.body: Quote from: Baofeng on October 03, 2022, 07:19:28 PMAnd since they have won their previous fight this year if I'm not mistaken, this fight has to take place but I was surprised that they have pushed it before the end of the year.And so we are again treated with another great fight between this two legends so for sure another 12 rounds of action pack between the two.This fight is long overdue and i don't know why the promoters of this fight keeps on delaying this, might be Estrada is buying some time to somehow let Gonzales aged a year so that he will be slower now than on their second fight hehe.Quote from: Baofeng on October 03, 2022, 07:19:28 PMJust another side note though that Nonito "The Filipino Flash" Donare wants to go down to this weight class. And he is targeting Chocolatito already, but let's see first this great fight and maybe Donaire wil l be just waiting at the side.Donaire must take a great sacrifice just to make this weight at this stage of his career and if he could and face Chocolatito or Estrada then i think he has the great chance to beat either of the two and make Chocolatito retires. Though he looked old at the hands of Inoue but they should not be overconfident when facing the Filipino Flash as his patented left hook is still fatal when his opponent is not named Inoue.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on October 03, 2022, 02:19:37 PMThis trilogy will prove which one is the best here, looking from the odds Chocolatito is the favorite with 1.50x odds while Estrada is the underdog with 2.48x odds.Estrada vs. Chocolatito, they are both the most anticipated and best fight candidate boxers, both have class and good results in the boxing arena, I've watched the two of them meet in 2012, which was held at the Sports Arena, both of which are now dubbed flyweight boxers.I've seen both of them bet and throw punches, but this time I seem to have a feeling that the boxing victory this time will be won by: Estrada.

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on October 03, 2022, 02:19:37 PMThe first fight Estrada vs Chocolatito, Chocolatito won via Unanimous Decision. The second fight were controversial since many people saw Chocolatito clearly won, but two judges score favor on Estrada, especially there's one judge score 117-111 while their fight are really close.They are both good fighters and the fight will be to settle the score among them of who is a better fighter. For Estrada, he will have to do a better and more convincing job if he is going to win Chocolatito who is a more experienced fighter with higher KO's because the judges may not be able to favor him this time. Chocolatito will be many people's bet to win but the underdog in any fight can be highly underestimated which can be an advantage for them. Estrada may most likely win this time again, maybe clearly without doubts.

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Estrada vs chocolatito is a good matchup it because ad we all know that these two great boxer defending themselves in order to claim the victory in the end but for now I am favor on Estrada because ad we can see his fighting style and technique is very effective in any aspects and for sure this will be a good opportunity to him to prove who is he inside the ring. Maybe this fight ends with a unanimous decision and not a KO but still Estrada will win.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Chocolatito is the better fighter but judges seem to want to see a trilogy for the promoters to make money if they pick the fight where they left then Chocolatito will have the advantage and the win, Estrada should show something new here, In both fights Chocolatito always gets the better of the exchanges, what I like about the two fighters is their style, they love to engage and stand toe to toe and that's what we are going to see in their third fight.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: bisdak40 on October 04, 2022, 01:10:05 PMQuote from: Baofeng on October 03, 2022, 07:19:28 PMAnd since they have won their previous fight this year if I'm not mistaken, this fight has to take place but I was surprised that they have pushed it before the end of the year.And so we are again treated with another great fight between this two legends so for sure another 12 rounds of action pack between the two.This fight is long overdue and i don't know why the promoters of this fight keeps on delaying this, might be Estrada is buying some time to somehow let Gonzales aged a year so that he will be slower now than on their second fight hehe.Quote from: Baofeng on October 03, 2022, 07:19:28 PMJust another side note though that Nonito "The Filipino Flash" Donare wants to go down to this weight class. And he is targeting Chocolatito already, but let's see first this great fight and maybe Donaire wil l be just waiting at the side.Donaire must take a great sacrifice just to make this weight at this stage of his career and if he could and face Chocolatito or Estrada then i think he has the great chance to beat either of the two and make Chocolatito retires. Though he looked old at the hands of Inoue but they should not be overconfident when facing the Filipino Flash as his patented left hook is still fatal when his opponent is not named Inoue.The last fight of Chocolatito is this March and he won. While Estrada is just this September if I'm not mistaken. And their 2nd bout is December 2021. So it will be exactly just a year prior. And I was talking about Estrada though, because he will have to go back to the gym again after his win just last month. Nevertheless, as we have said, after he won he said he will take the privilege and give Roman his trilogy.Yes, Donaire will have to go down again, and as also do agree that he has a big chance against those two because of his left hook and the power and  the speed as well.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on October 04, 2022, 02:46:26 PMChocolatito is the better fighter but judges seem to want to see a trilogy for the promoters to make money if they pick the fight where they left then Chocolatito will have the advantage and the win, Estrada should show something new here, In both fights Chocolatito always gets the better of the exchanges, what I like about the two fighters is their style, they love to engage and stand toe to toe and that's what we are going to see in their third fight.They should really settle for the last time since Choco is getting old and already passed his prime. Another exciting trilogy we will have this year and this one should also be settled for the fans and both boxers to remove any doubt in their last fights. I think this one will be the best since they both gonna give their best to prove to everyone that they are the best boxer against each other. maybe This time they won't let the judges decide who gonna win and they will gonna wrap it up when they see an opportunity to finish one another.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: yazher on October 06, 2022, 05:04:58 AMQuote from: robelneo on October 04, 2022, 02:46:26 PMChocolatito is the better fighter but judges seem to want to see a trilogy for the promoters to make money if they pick the fight where they left then Chocolatito will have the advantage and the win, Estrada should show something new here, In both fights Chocolatito always gets the better of the exchanges, what I like about the two fighters is their style, they love to engage and stand toe to toe and that's what we are going to see in their third fight.They should really settle for the last time since Choco is getting old and already passed his prime. Another exciting trilogy we will have this year and this one should also be settled for the fans and both boxers to remove any doubt in their last fights. I think this one will be the best since they both gonna give their best to prove to everyone that they are the best boxer against each other. maybe This time they won't let the judges decide who gonna win and they will gonna wrap it up when they see an opportunity to finish one another. They say style makes a fight and a trilogy can only happen if we have fighters that compliment each other style, like the Marquez - Pacquiao fights and the boxing community always support trilogies because it the continuation of the excitement of the previous two fights, I'm sure both fighters will show up to fight hopefully one of them will end this trilogy, its a legacy fight for both fighters I hope Chocolatito wins this one, so he can cement his legacy, Estrada can still go on as he is still young.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on October 06, 2022, 05:55:44 AMQuote from: yazher on October 06, 2022, 05:04:58 AMQuote from: robelneo on October 04, 2022, 02:46:26 PMChocolatito is the better fighter but judges seem to want to see a trilogy for the promoters to make money if they pick the fight where they left then Chocolatito will have the advantage and the win, Estrada should show something new here, In both fights Chocolatito always gets the better of the exchanges, what I like about the two fighters is their style, they love to engage and stand toe to toe and that's what we are going to see in their third fight.They should really settle for the last time since Choco is getting old and already passed his prime. Another exciting trilogy we will have this year and this one should also be settled for the fans and both boxers to remove any doubt in their last fights. I think this one will be the best since they both gonna give their best to prove to everyone that they are the best boxer against each other. maybe This time they won't let the judges decide who gonna win and they will gonna wrap it up when they see an opportunity to finish one another. They say style makes a fight and a trilogy can only happen if we have fighters that compliment each other style, like the Marquez - Pacquiao fights and the boxing community always support trilogies because it the continuation of the excitement of the previous two fights, I'm sure both fighters will show up to fight hopefully one of them will end this trilogy, its a legacy fight for both fighters I hope Chocolatito wins this one, so he can cement his legacy, Estrada can still go on as he is still young.I think Gonzalez already cemented his legacy in the 115 lbs as he had defeated a lot of great fighters in this division. But it seems he had met his match against a tough Mexican in Estrada. Of course, we will support trilogies as boxing fans, recently we just saw the Canelo vs GGG fight although it seems that GGG is already past his prime as he was dominated by Canelo. But this fight is still 50/50 in my opinion, although Chocolatito seems to the betting favorite, but not going to be easy match for him.

comments.author: Yamifoud
comments.body: i'm rooting for Chocolatito to win, I think he is more technical so he will likely win this fight. it's a trilogy that but I'm not so excited on this one as it's not the same as the other trilogy where the fight was really close. Well, I might be wrong, but I see this fight to end up a one sided fight only, that's in favor to Chocolatito.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: Quote from: Baofeng on October 05, 2022, 11:33:17 PMQuote from: bisdak40 on October 04, 2022, 01:10:05 PMQuote from: Baofeng on October 03, 2022, 07:19:28 PMAnd since they have won their previous fight this year if I'm not mistaken, this fight has to take place but I was surprised that they have pushed it before the end of the year.And so we are again treated with another great fight between this two legends so for sure another 12 rounds of action pack between the two.This fight is long overdue and i don't know why the promoters of this fight keeps on delaying this, might be Estrada is buying some time to somehow let Gonzales aged a year so that he will be slower now than on their second fight hehe.Quote from: Baofeng on October 03, 2022, 07:19:28 PMJust another side note though that Nonito "The Filipino Flash" Donare wants to go down to this weight class. And he is targeting Chocolatito already, but let's see first this great fight and maybe Donaire wil l be just waiting at the side.Donaire must take a great sacrifice just to make this weight at this stage of his career and if he could and face Chocolatito or Estrada then i think he has the great chance to beat either of the two and make Chocolatito retires. Though he looked old at the hands of Inoue but they should not be overconfident when facing the Filipino Flash as his patented left hook is still fatal when his opponent is not named Inoue.The last fight of Chocolatito is this March and he won. While Estrada is just this September if I'm not mistaken. And their 2nd bout is December 2021. So it will be exactly just a year prior. And I was talking about Estrada though, because he will have to go back to the gym again after his win just last month. Nevertheless, as we have said, after he won he said he will take the privilege and give Roman his trilogy.Yes, Donaire will have to go down again, and as also do agree that he has a big chance against those two because of his left hook and the power and  the speed as well.And with that, does it mean that Estrada is the fresher of the two since he just had his last fight in September? Or it doesn't make sense out of it, they should be back to 0 and train as hard as they can?In any case, Donaire could be their biggest threat and I agree that maybe Estrada will be a good test for him before going against the veteran as well in Chocolatito. But we will wait then, they will face each other first and Donaire just chillin and waiting for the winner.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Yamifoud on October 06, 2022, 11:46:25 AMi'm rooting for Chocolatito to win, I think he is more technical so he will likely win this fight. it's a trilogy that but I'm not so excited on this one as it's not the same as the other trilogy where the fight was really close. Well, I might be wrong, but I see this fight to end up a one sided fight only, that's in favor to Chocolatito.The majority of us here picked Chocolatito, but it could be a new fight if one of them shows something new here, the first two-fight was dominated by Chocolatito many thought he wins the match, this is what happen the fight was left in the hands of the judges, I have seen so many controversial fights and this one is included, I hope this time they picked the right judges and the winner deserves his win, there could be no fourth fight between the two, they just need to pick the right set of judges

comments.author: Yamifoud
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on October 06, 2022, 12:25:55 PMQuote from: Yamifoud on October 06, 2022, 11:46:25 AMi'm rooting for Chocolatito to win, I think he is more technical so he will likely win this fight. it's a trilogy that but I'm not so excited on this one as it's not the same as the other trilogy where the fight was really close. Well, I might be wrong, but I see this fight to end up a one sided fight only, that's in favor to Chocolatito.The majority of us here picked Chocolatito, but it could be a new fight if one of them shows something new here, the first two-fight was dominated by Chocolatito many thought he wins the match, this is what happen the fight was left in the hands of the judges, I have seen so many controversial fights and this one is included, I hope this time they picked the right judges and the winner deserves his win, there could be no fourth fight between the two, they just need to pick the right set of judges Yeah, there will be no 4th fight if Chocolatito will win this fight, it's better if he could just KO Estrada so judges decision is not anymore necessary. Estrada is a very aggressive fighter, with a great timing, I think Chocolatito could finish him. Lots of good fights this coming December, hopefully I'm wrong with my prediction so somehow could I could enjoy this fight.
